'''1.6.4 Build 10''' is the tenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released in 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Read/Write test when starting Launcher to ensure everything will work.
* If tried to start multiple servers in the same port you get a notification and the new server shuts down.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Empty tooltip showing in mods GUI.

* Students couldn't always use some blocks or items like turtles and mailboxes. Now they are usable with an empty hand.
